name: Super Spotty Brothers
description:
"Ladybug, ladybug, fly away home. Your house is on fire, and your children are gone..."

Picking up where the classic nursery rhyme ends, play as the eldest brother of the ladybug family, charged with rescuing your little brothers who have fled into the forest. Enjoy the sounds of nature and whimsical wildlife as you hitch a ride on a dragonfly, fend off the ants, and bring your brothers back home!

This single-level game was the final project for the Coursera course, "Game Development for Modern Platforms." See the About screen for more details and instructions.
